sentences.sentence: I seem to be in evil case—and all for an innocent and thoughtless pleasantry.
sentences.translation: 我似乎陷入了不幸的境地——而这一切都是出于一种天真而轻率的玩笑。

sentences.sentence: I said: "Any other time you would have laughed at my little pleasantry."
sentences.translation: 我说：“其他任何时候你都可以笑我无聊。”

sentences.sentence: Elizabeth tried to join in her father's pleasantry, but could only force one most reluctant smile.
sentences.translation: 伊丽莎白尽量凑着父亲打趣，可是她的笑容显得极其勉强。 父亲的俏皮幽默，从来没有象今天这样不讨她喜欢。
